questions.question:
The output of the following C program is__________.

  void f1(int a, int b) {
    int c;
    c=a; a=b; b=c;
}
void f2(int *a, int *b) {
    int c;
    c=*a; *a=*b; *b=c;
}
int main(){
    int a=4, b=5, c=6;
    f1(a,b);
    f2(&b, &c);
     printf("%d",c-a-b);
}
